item.description:
SPRING IS IN THE AIR!!! LET'S HIKE THE TRAILS AT Benson's PARK.

This will be a leasurely 3 mile walk around the park. Anyone that wishes to walk faster can go ahead and meet us at the benches at Swan Pond. Anyone that doesn't want to go that far can start our with us and then take a shorter trail to to Swan Pond.

Everyone is invited to go to Dairy Queen afterwords for a snack or beverage.

Please bring plenty of water and dress in layers so that you don't over heat. As always, participation in this meetup event is at your own risk.

This event is cross-posted to multiple meetups so please RSVP "YES" on one site only. No need to RSVP for "NO."

Contact Barbara at 603-540-7467 if you need additional information.
item.how_to_find_us: LET'S MEET BY THE TRAIL MAP AT THE ENTRANCE

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: MID-DAY MID-WEEK HIKE
